text: NYSE Chicago, formerly known as the Chicago Stock Exchange (CHX), is a stock exchange in Chicago, Illinois, United States. The exchange is a national securities exchange and self-regulatory organization. It works with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). Intercontinental Exchange (ICE) bought CHX in July 2018. ==References== Category:1880s establishments in Illinois Category:1882 establishments in the United States Category:Companies based in Chicago Category:Stock exchanges in the United States Category:Buildings and structures in Chicago
title: NYSE Chicago
